Text:
You are a legend! I have been searching for the official DVD release of Daria for ages!
I just hope the quality is good : D
Nabbla is a GOD amongst Men.  Can never thank enough but I do what I can and that is to SEED!
I have no idea why, but once this torrent FINALLY finished downloading, there were no actual episodes for me to watch.  This may be a dud, or I'm just missing something here.
I've heard the DVD episodes don't have the music from when they originally aired. Is that all they edited?
